name: weather-widgets
author: John Giatropoulos
description: A collection of weather and forecast widgets for your dashboard. Displays current conditions, weekly forecasts, and severe weather alerts.

widgets.name: CurrentWeather
widgets.description: Shows current weather conditions including temperature, humidity, and wind speed.

widgets.name: WeeklyForecast
widgets.description: Weekly weather forecast with daily high/low temperatures and conditions.

widgets.name: WeatherAlerts
widgets.description: Displays active severe weather alerts for your area.
